short_summary: Supply, delivery and installation of FTIR-ATR Spectrometer and AT module
description: This procurement is to provide FTIR-ATR Spectrometer, AT module and hydraulic pellet press with standard 7 mm pellet die and pellet ring holder. Installation and training are also included.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### End User Entities

### Contact Information

tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Description
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) requires the supply, delivery, and installation (including training) of:

* 1 Fourier transform infrared (FTIR) spectrometer
* 1 Attenuated total reflectance (ATR) module
* 1 Minimum 2 Ton hydraulic pellet press with standard 7 mm pellet die and pellet ring holder

**Note:** Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 15 September 2022 at 14:00 HAE.

This announcement is for a Request for Proposal (RFP) with a Competitive - Open Bidding procurement method. The selection criteria for this tender is Lowest Price. There are no trade agreements applicable to this tender.
